short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension to summarise a page content

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Our chrome extension app provides a quick and easy way to summarise the content on any webpage. Simply click on the extension icon and within seconds, you'll get a concise summary of the main points on the page. Whether you're short on time or just want a quick overview, our summary tool is the perfect solution. Give it a try and see how it can help you save time and stay informed.

Usage:
- Install the extension
- Pin the extension to your browser
- Open a web page / refresh an existing page (not this one)
- Click on the extension
- Enjoy your TL;DR summary!
